programme.title: Fried Rice Paradise - EP 10
programme.desc: Osman comes clean with Bee and explains what actually happened the night Wai Ling died. Bee masters all the recipes except for Fried Rice Paradise. Rickson opens a new restaurant that has a very familiar menu.

programme.title: Perfect One - EP 10
programme.desc: Kate thinks she has everything a 30 year-old Singaporean can ask for: a successful career, a beautiful house and looks that draw envious attention from others. However, as her grandma's 90th birthday celebration draws near, she is pressured to find the only thing she lacks - a date. She downloads Perfect 1 and is matched to the mysterious Sam. They bond over messaging and arrange for a meetup. In an unexpected turn of events, Sam does not show up and Kate is left with questions unanswered.

programme.title: Jamestown - EP 5

programme.title: 小城花样多 Small Town Surprises - EP 10

The Law brothers pay their respects to a world class lion dance troupe champion and learn about the different types of durians in a local Durian Farm. 说到麻坡，相信大家一定会想到乌达！这个星期，我们的刘家来到了麻坡第一间冷冻乌达制作工厂，了解乌达的制作过程。刘家兄弟也向当地荣获 “狮王之王” 美誉的世界冠军舞狮团拜师学艺。此外，刘家还在当地的榴莲园大饱口福，边学习榴莲的种植过程，边尝试不同极品的榴莲。.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 一座山一条河 Tuesday Report - A Hill And A River - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Singapore River, 3.2-km long with 12 bridges erected over it, was the key in turning Singapore into a vibrant free port soon after Raffles landed in 1819. Many Chinese Hokkien & Teochew merchants established their business empire along the river, thereby drawing generations of migrant workers from China to seek a better life in Singapore. Descendants of pioneer merchant Seet Hoot Kee and multinational enterprise "Tan Guan Lee" and former coolies share their stories to illustrate the prosperity and the hard life forefathers had gone through by the river in the last two centuries. (重)3.2 公里长的新加坡河，穿越12座桥梁，造就新加坡成为自由贸易港，开埠200年来多少风云人物、平民百姓在此留下脚印？靠河起家的福建和潮州籍商人、搬货运货的估俚与驳船夫，构筑新加坡河百多年的河港荣景。节目访问开埠先驱薛佛记的第七代后人、百年跨国企业陈元利号的第五代后人陈克湛、年过90的前估俚等人，诉说新加坡河走过的辉煌岁月。.

programme.desc: (R) In South Korean history, there is a pioneer female royal doctor called "Da Chang-Jin", who created superb imperial cuisine for the king. (重)韩国史书上记载的首位女御医大长今，熔古铸今，创造出超群绝伦的宫廷御膳。珍馐美馔，不仅是一国之君调理养身的基石，更是舌尖上的一大欢飨。遵循《大长今》故事细腻的笔触，谢韵仪将探索韩国宫廷御膳料理的奥妙。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) In South Korean history, there is a pioneer female royal doctor called "Da Chang-Jin", who created superb imperial cuisine for the king. As host Michelle Chia savours the tales of Da Chang-Jin's life, she discovers the delectable and nutritious tastes of these old royal recipes. (重)韩国史书上记载的首位女御医大长今，熔古铸今，创造出超群绝伦的宫廷御膳。珍馐美馔，不仅是一国之君调理养身的基石，更是舌尖上的一大欢飨。遵循《大长今》故事细腻的笔触，谢韵仪将探索韩国宫廷御膳料理的奥妙。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) Zhi-an hesitates to attend Zhitai's wedding as she does not know how to face her family. However, Daojing sends her to the ceremony as he does not want her to regret in future. Zaicheng receives an anonymous letter that informs him the Zhi-an is not Enshi. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)道京故意带知安到知泰的婚礼现场，希望她不要因为一时不知如何面对家人而错过哥哥的婚礼。有人寄了一封信给载成，说知安不是恩石。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) Master Jiang's dyed fabric disappears midway through the 40th-anniversary celebration. Just as Daojing and his team panic, Zhi-an rushes back to the company to retrieve the piece of fabric Master Jiang gave her previously and is slightly injured during the process. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)郑江水大师为40周年庆染的布料不翼而飞，令道京等人没有布料布置会场。正当大家不知所措时，知安开着摩托车回公司拿大师之前送给她的布料，帮大家解围。道京发现知安为了布料受伤，很心疼。.

programme.title: 创! (PG) Start Up! - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Doobie confessed that she is the mastermind for all the events that had happened. She had joined Graffiti with the motive of revenge for her mother who was killed in the car accident 12 years ago. Will Doobie, Qi Cai, Sun Shao and Yin Xuan be able to start up again after all had happened? (PG)(重)(大结局)Doobie向殷萱澄清一切都是自己的策划。 Doobie向殷萱解释她早就知道殷堂是撞死自己母亲的人，而且她加入Graffiti是为了报仇。 奇才终于和Jessie和好了，孙少也到了泰国，开了一间cafe。Doobie出狱后，飞过去和孙少一起。Pepper现在变成Graffiti的总经理。.

programme.title: 一人行。暖人心 Going Miles, Spreading Smiles - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) An initiative that started in 2012 by two brothers Chong Kai & Gin Kai, "Wheels for HOPE" brings bicycles to the disadvantaged and impoverished rural communities in Cambodia. (重)(最后一集)一对热爱骑单车的兄弟档，2012年开始了"Wheels For Hope"，发起募款活动，捐赠脚车给柬埔寨村民。这4年来，他们共捐助将近千辆的脚车，让生病的村民得以到医院接受治疗、小孩重新回到学校上课，大大改善了当地人的生活状况。最感动的是学校校长表示，因为有了脚车，学生人数不断增加，缺席率减少了。更鼓舞兄弟每年风雨不改一定要到柬埔寨偏远乡村行善，送脚车。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 35
programme.desc: (R) Yinghao tells Zaiyong that he will not force Xiuqing to marry him. Zaiyong feels betrayed and decides to plot a revenge against Yinghao, Xiantai and Xiuqing. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英鎬约载永喝酒，说不会逼秀卿嫁给他，希望载永让秀卿到她喜欢的男人的身边。载永决定要对英鎬、贤泰和秀卿展开报复。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) The Hospital ship is hijacked by members of a drug syndicate. The syndicate boss has been shot in a gang battle and they demand that Enzai treat him. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)黑帮头目在一场火拼中受伤，黑帮大哥强行上了医疗船，并指定要恩在为他们的头目治伤。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 27
programme.desc: Daojing and Zhi-an share a kiss when they both know it's about time to reveal the truth. Shuxian goes on a date with Zhixin and is unexpectedly beaten by a woman who claims to be Zhixin's wife. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道京和知安两人都知道揭发真相的日子快到了，于是依依不舍地在街边接吻。志新和书贤去拍拖，自称是志新老婆的女人却突然出现对书贤又打又骂。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 28
programme.desc: Zhi-an wants to come clean about her identity, but Zaicheng reveals the truth before she is able to do so. Zhi-an apologises profusely and tries to offer her explanation. However, Zaicheng is certain that Zhi-an has cheated them on purpose and throws her out of the house. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安独自回崔家面对载成和明熙。在她还没开口时，载成出乎意料地说他已经知道她不是恩石了，还拿出亲子鉴定报告。知安承认早就知道真相，拼命道歉，但载成不听她解释，并把她赶出崔家。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 4
programme.desc: In a country known for its recent pain of civil strife and its love of Cricket, a group of teenage girls have decided to form a soccer team and bend it like Beckham. Nothing unusual about that, except that these girls have made it to third spot in the National Soccer League - and are doing so without even the most basic soccer gear - not even a single pair of boots. Host Pei Fen lugs her special delivery of boots onto a train - for the long ride from Colombo to Kilinochchi... 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 4
programme.desc: Bjorn visits local food SMEs - Lim Kee and Bakers Heaven, which are both adamant that quality should not be compromised but instead, improved with automation. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 8
programme.desc: Eric accidentally causes Dong Huang to be injured. He learned from the news that Andre has fled to the south, and calls Zhen Di for help to look after Dong Huang while he heads to the south to look for Andre. Before leaving, Eric apologises to Dong Huang, and reveals to him what he has been through all these years. The two finally reconciles. (PG)Eric意外导致栋煌受伤，他从新闻得知安德烈往南部逃窜，便打电话给甄蒂求助，请她来照顾栋煌，自己决定动身往南部寻找安德烈的下落。离去前，Eric向栋煌道歉，坦诚道出自己这些年的心路历程，两人终于和好。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 买卖 Business As Usual - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) With intense competition and long working hours in South Korea, ways to relieve stress have become new businesses. More people are now willing to pay for quirky ways to de-stress. This episode will explore new businesses like ASMR, "eating broadcast", oxygen capsule cafes and hiring homemakers. (重)韩国社会竞争大、工作时间长， 如何纾解压力正在发展成为韩国新兴行业！越来越多人愿意付钱消费各种奇特方法，换来一次情绪和压力的解放，本集将深入吃播镜头背后的生活和故事、观看者心态，以及整理师通过整理房子舒缓屋主忧郁不安情绪等交易，探讨韩国各种不同的"纾压"买卖。.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 传说中的料理 II Legendary Cuisines 2 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Do you know that Genghis Khan must have grilled skewered mutton before he leaves for the battlefield? Or how is the Dowager Chrysanthemum Hot Pot related to Empress Cixi? The new season of Legendary Cuisines has the answers. (重)(最后一集).

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 36
programme.desc: (R) Shuzi wants Xiantai to move in with them together with Xiaoxun after he marries Xiuqing. Zhenshu then proposes to take care of Xiaoxun on her own. Xiantai does not agree to leave Xiaoxun behind. He also insists in staying with Zhenshu after marriage. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰拜访秀卿的家人。淑子要贤泰在结婚后带着小勋搬到他们家，当入赘女婿。真淑听说淑子要贤泰入赘，于是跟美慈建议由她抚养小勋。贤泰不同意丢下小勋，也坚持要跟真淑同住。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) The boss survives the operation; however, the hijackers demand Enzai disembark with them. Meantime, the police coast guard arrived and during the commotion, Guo Xian is shot by the syndicate's leader. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩在和郭贤总算成功完成手术，救活了黑帮头目，可惜黑帮大哥却不肯释放船上的人，还要挟带恩在离开。此时，水警到来，黑帮大哥大怒下开枪，郭贤竟不幸中枪。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 29
programme.desc: Shuxian is worried when Zhixin says he will divorce his wife. Shuxian has only wanted to date Zhixin for fun and has not considered a future with him. Xianyu Xi discovers that Nanjiu is the boss of the bakery. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)志新说要跟老婆离婚，然后对书贤负责。书贤只是为了一时的刺激才会跟志新搞暧昧，根本没想过要跟志新结婚。书贤着急，找知浩帮忙。鲜于希到面包店问候生病的知秀，发现南九就是面包店老板。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 30
programme.desc: Zhixiu is enraged when she discovers that Zhi-an has known about the truth long ago. She feels that Zhi-an has not treated her like a family member and has also valued material gains more than their relationship. Zhixiu asks to meet Zhi-an and subsequently slaps Zhi-an. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知秀发现知安早就知道她们的身份对调，却没有通知她，觉得知安没有把她当家人看待，而且爱钱比爱她多，于是约知安见面然后打知安一巴掌。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 4
programme.desc: It is said that India is the world's largest open-air toilet. Nearly 600 million people and half of India's population, still defecate outdoors. Can you imagine more than 53% of households and as high as 70% in rural areas do not have any toilets? Why do Indians do not like to build toilets at home? 有人说，印度是世界最大的露天厕所，因为有将近6亿人在户外解决问题，占了印度人口的一半。超过百分之53，农村的比例还高达百分之70的家庭，没有厕所，你能想象吗？为什么印度人不喜欢在家里建厕所呢？.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 9
programme.desc: Eric posts a notice on the hackers' site to find someone to impersonate Justin for a USD50,000 reward. Unexpectedly, Picaud takes the bait and arranges to meet Eric, but he spreads this information to the media and the police at the same time. Brother Fa leads the team to ambush Eric. Eric spots the police officers and flees the scene. (PG)Eric在骇客网站发布追缉令，愿意付5万美金悬赏，寻找冒名顶替Justin的人。没想到Picaud自己主动冒出来，在网上约Eric见面，同时把这个消息泄漏给媒体和警方，发哥带领大队人马前来围捕。Eric发现警方人员出现，快步逃离现场。.

programme.title: 金装律师 Suits - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Kangshuo agrees to help Heyan stop Xian Jize from returning to the law firm on the condition that Heyan employs Jin Wenxi. Wenxi is threatened by Jinshi on her first day of work at KANG & HAM. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)康硕答应帮荷妍阻止咸基泽回姜与咸律师所上班，但条件是要荷妍聘请金文熙检察官。文熙第一天上班就被槿识威胁。.

programme.title: 我也可以是韩星 Miss Korea - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) In the new season of Miss Korea, 2 young ladies from totally different cultures and background (one Chinese who lives in Australia & the other Singaporean) will leave the comfort of their homes and embark on a 3 months journey to fulfil a K-Pop dream in Korea... (重)两个来自完全不同文化和生活背景的女生Julia和Jojo为了完成她们的韩星梦,远赴韩国进行3个月的造星训练。在人生地不熟的环境下,两个女生可否能和睦共处? 他们会实现梦想吗? 敬请期待!

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 37
programme.desc: (R) Shuzi faints when she discovers that Zhenshu is Xiantai's mother-in-law. Both Shuzi and Yinghao object to the marriage between Xiantai and Xiuqing. As they cannot reveal the real reason behind their objection, they tell Xiuqing that they think Zhenshu is an unlucky woman as her daughter has passed away before her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)淑子发现贤泰的岳母原来就是真淑，激动地晕倒。淑子将贤泰岳母的身份告诉英鎬，两人反对秀卿嫁给贤泰。因为不能说出反对的原因，两人于是告诉秀卿真淑白发人送黑发人，是个晦气的女人。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) A pregnant lady with complications boarded the hospital ship needing urgent Caesarian. Despite having no experiences, Enzai and team proceed with the operation after the lady's family consented. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)医疗船来了一名脐带脱垂的孕妇病人，要马上剖腹产子才能救下母子二人，可是恩在从来没有参与过生产的手术。眼见母子二人性命攸关，在家属的同意下，恩在和大家立刻进行剖腹产子。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 31
programme.desc: Zhi-an revisits a beach that she has gone with her family a long time ago. Thereafter, she goes deep into the woods and attempts suicide. Zhixiu moves in with the Cuis, but she is not willing to change her past habits. This causes Mingxi to be extremely displeased with her. programme.desc: (R) Kai Xiang finally remembers all the painful memories. After An Ran passed on, Kloudiia found it hard to move on and attempted unsuccessfully to take her own life. After she was recuperated, she left Kai Xiang without saying goodbye. Mei Ling told Kai Xiang that An Ran's death anniversary was coming up. Kai Xiang visits An Ran's grave and discovers a family portrait his son drew. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)凯翔终于记起了那段痛苦的时光。当时，他逃离婚礼，十万火急地赶到医院探望病危的儿子。那也是他和Kloudiia陪着安然，度过他短暂人生中最后的幸福时光。不料安然离世后，Kloudiia仍无法走出丧子之痛，割脉自杀。虽然被救活，Kloudiia却最终选择不告而别。而回到新加坡的凯翔，却不幸遇到车祸，醒来后把一切都忘记了……美玲告诉凯翔，安然的忌日将到。凯翔一行人来到安然的坟前祭拜。看着坟前安然画的全家福，凯翔拾起了一些和安然最后的回忆。.

programme.desc: From horny goat weeds to pearls that are eaten! Do you have the appetite for adventure? Find out how pearls - yes, that jewellery staple - can slay pimples. And which popular food ingredient has deadly cyanide in it. Are you broke? Well, Peifen knows a place where wild (and free) durians grow. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 2
programme.desc: In South Korean history, there is a pioneer female royal doctor called "Da Chang-Jin", who created superb imperial cuisine for the king. As host Michelle Chia savours the tales of Da Chang-Jin's life, she discovers the delectable and nutritious tastes of these old royal recipes. 韩国史书上记载的首位女御医大长今，熔古铸今，创造出超群绝伦的宫廷御膳。珍馐美馔，不仅是一国之君调理养身的基石，更是舌尖上的一大欢飨。遵循《大长今》故事细腻的笔触，谢韵仪将探索韩国宫廷御膳料理的奥妙。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 5
programme.desc: Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 4
programme.desc: In a country known for its recent pain of civil strife and its love of Cricket, a group of teenage girls have decided to form a soccer team and bend it like Beckham. Nothing unusual about that, except that these girls have made it to third spot in the National Soccer League - and are doing so without even the most basic soccer gear - not even a single pair of boots. Host Pei Fen lugs her special delivery of boots onto a train - for the long ride from Colombo to Kilinochchi... 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 4
programme.desc: Bjorn visits local food SMEs - Lim Kee and Bakers Heaven, which are both adamant that quality should not be compromised but instead, improved with automation. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

Khalid is on a winning streak and buys things for the family, much to the suspicion of Melissa.

programme.title: Kelas Kekek - EP 7

programme.title: Jom Kahwin - EP 13

Having grown up with the animals, these three young men, Chad, Baim and Daniel, aren't the most well-mannered. To switch things up and bring change to the farm, Adam decides to venture into the city and scout for a potential bride who can also serve as an 'elder sister' for his brothers and become the 'ideal' housewife, whatever the latter means.
